review: Be careful booking thru Priceline. I don't see any active hotel review link. Just spent the night in an absolute dump. Place should be condemned or at least not offered to the travelling public in Fort Lauderdale. No pool, no elevator, property looked smelled horrible, undesirables everywhere, no lobby just a drive up transaction window. Web pictures are all lies. You get the idea. Drive past and keep going. Oh and there seems to be no way to get in touch with Priceline to get a potential refund
response: I'm sorry to hear about your negative experience with Priceline. Please contact their customer service at 1-400-739-38 and provide them with your offer number so they can assist you with a potential refund. It's important to communicate your concerns directly with Priceline to address the issue effectively.

review: Nice trip n organized in a great way. Only thing if we would have been intimated that Gandola ride depend on weather so would have chosen the day as per weather.
response: Thank you for your positive feedback! We appreciate your suggestion and will consider providing information about weather-dependent activities in advance for better trip planning.

review:
I have been a platinum member, and regularly booking with them for at least 5 years. Never had an issue until today, to realize their customer service was terrible.
I'm unable to speak to a supervisor, line drops and long wait line and still nothing.
They advertise the wrong location on their website and no one wants to take responsibility for their error.
response: I apologize for the poor customer service experience you encountered. To assist you further, please reach out to our customer service at 1-400-739-38 and provide them with your offer number. We value your loyalty and want to address your concerns promptly.

review:
I am a retired airline employee and love to travel but things these days change as did my plans.
I had to put off my trip by one day in Nashville and Priceline refused to change my rental car reservation. The price was the same with their site for both days and there were plenty of cars available. Absolutely no flexibility, so I booked with Expedia and it was actually cheaper, and they have a change/cancellation policy. I can see why the overall rating with Priceline is so low.
response: I'm sorry for the inconvenience you faced regarding your rental car reservation. To discuss this matter further and explore potential solutions, please contact our customer service at 1-400-739-38 and provide your offer number. We appreciate your feedback and the opportunity to improve your experience.
